    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Portable Gaming Hall](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1275)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 26</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A portable gaming hall resembles a miniature roulette wheel, except it's marked with indecipherable runes, not numbers.
